Data from experiment (conducted on December 2015).

* [Questionnaire (Qualtrics)](https://github.com/saaralonbarkat/site/blob/master/DATA_files/survey%20final.pdf).
* [Dataset (csv format)](https://github.com/saaralonbarkat/site/blob/master/DATA_files/PROMSYMB.csv).

<br>


```{r , warning = FALSE, message = FALSE,echo=FALSE}
require(rpivotTable)
require(dplyr)
PROMSYMB_01 = PROMSYMB %>%
  select(SYMBOL,AREA,EVALUATION_index,SATISFACTION,TRUST)
rpivotTable(PROMSYMB_01)
```
